Name: 大富翁少女/Rich Girls
About the game: 【Introduction】 'Rich Girls' is a casual board game / strategy game based on cards, dice and land properties. Players play the role of a gentleman, encountering various business ladies, and fighting against each others in the world of business war. 【Features】 ◆Fun and unique gameplay ◆Competitive against AI ◆Rich content, features 8 stages ◆Great music! ◆Fabulous art! ◆Crossover characters from 'Landlord Girls' and 'Pinball Girls'
